executiveSummary: James and Joanna from Raleigh, North Carolina pitched their Latin-inspired gourmet French fry business, Bueno Papa, on Shark Tank seeking $400,000 for 7% equity. After strong interest and negotiation, they accepted an offer from Robert for $400,000 in exchange for 19% equity.
keyDecisions: Robert invested $400,000 for 19% equity in Bueno Papa.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement with Robert for $400,000 at 19% equity.
Open new store in Wynwood, Miami as planned.
Continue franchise expansion following successful initial sales.

nextSteps: James and Joanna will proceed with Robertâ€™s investment, open their Miami location, and expand the Bueno Papa franchise network to grow their brand nationally.
